title: WTF is this directx error *******
body:
????? I played just last night before the patch and everything was running smoothly, and then I patch the game and I can't jump into the game due to an unknown directx error? I know it isnt my gfx card because I just ran Overwatch and WoW on it to test it... Riot please don't let me get leaverbuster'd because of this.... pls fix ASAP

EDIT: Went into  C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and deleted game.cfg file, then I launched the game using lol.admin. It seems to work because i just tested the game in practice mode.

replies.body: We've been looking into an issue where some PC players are getting a DirectX error, and the cause may be an issue with some custom resolution.  In this case, we're recommending deleting the Config folder as a work around, which will restore your resolution and settings to default so you can get back in-game.  Glad that worked out for you!
can I get back my 20lp that I lost due to this? any other leaver buster penalties held against me?

It sucks you lost that LP, sorry dude.  :(  We can't adjust game stats, but we can take a look at leaverbuster situations on a case by case basis.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see if we can do anything- without guarantees.  I hope that helps!
